alert.note: Alert for Camp; Franklin; Titus; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 9:31PM CDT until October 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Northern Wood County in northeastern Texas... Western Titus County in northeastern Texas... Western Camp County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 931 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Klondike to near Cumby to Hawk Cove, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Leesburg, Hagansport, Mount Vernon, Quitman, Scroggins, Lake Fork Reservoir, Pleasant Grove, Newsome, Purley, Hainesville, Forest Hill, Winfield, Talco, Alba, Yantis, Miller`s Cove, Hopewell, Monticello, and Cypress. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
